english.segment1: Joyful joyful we adore You. God of glory, Lord of love. Hearts unfold like flowers before You. Opening to the sun above
english.segment2: Melt the clouds of sin and sadness. Drive the dark of doubt away. Giver of Eternal gladness. Fill us with the light of day
english.segment3: You are the One who saves. You are the One who saves. You are the One whoÂ’s hands lift us from the grave. You are the light of life. The everlasting day. You are the One who takes all our sins away
english.segment4: You are giving and forgiving. Ever blessing, ever blessed. Fountain of the joy of living. Ocean depths of happy rest
english.segment5: Jesus you are my rescue. Jesus you are my rescue. I give you everything I am
